content.raw: Sorry for being late to the party. We have talked about this in person but I leave it on the record here. We bumped default to `4.0.0` at some point but that broke CI because we didn't have an updated Homebrew formula. That's why we reverted the version to `3.x.x`. Then, we were about to release a bunch of changes, so I created the `ign-transport4` release branch and targeted the PRs to that branch. However, not all the changes that we want for `ign-transport4` are ready, that's why it hasn't been released yet.
content.html: Sorry for being late to the party. We have talked about this in person but I leave it on the record here. We bumped default to 4.0.0 at some point but that broke CI because we didn't have an updated Homebrew formula. That's why we reverted the version to 3.x.x. Then, we were about to release a bunch of changes, so I created the ign-transport4 release branch and targeted the PRs to that branch. However, not all the changes that we want for ign-transport4 are ready, that's why it hasn't been released yet.
